name: CultPong
description:
This ain't your grandmother's Pong game. This one's brutal, fast-paced and competitive.

What makes CultPong different is the bash move and accompanying camera effects, which turns every exchange into a violent slug-fest, with fine control over ball direction due to the shape of the paddle.

Currently only has local play, with one player on WASD and the other on arrows.

This is a game that I made last year. I never released it because I had this super innovative networking algorithm planned which would completely hide all lag regardless of connection quality.

I had some friends over yesterday and we had fun just playing it offline, so I decided to  release it so others can have that fun, too. I will revisit it some day to turn it into the live service competitive mobile MMO it deserves to be :P
